content.html:
The
Shooting
Menus

COLOR SHADING CORRECTION


Color (shading) variations between the center and edges of the frame can be ad- justed separately for each corner. the무: B:0
To use color shading correction, follow steps below.R:0 こ NEXT OK SET

1 Rotate the rear command dial to choose a corner. The select-
ed corner is indicated by a triangle.

2 Use the focus stick (focus lever) to adjust shading until there is
no visible difference in color between the selected corner and
the center of the image.


● Press the focus stick left or right to adjust colors on the
cyan-red axis.
● Press the focus stick up or down to adjust colors on the
blue-yellow axis.


To determine the amount required, adjust color shading correction
while taking photos of blue sky or a sheet of gray paper.

# COLOR SHADING CORRECTION

| Color (shading) variations between the center and edges of the frame can be ad- justed separately for each corner. the | 무: B:0 |
| --- | --- |
| To use color shading correction, follow steps below. | R:0 こ NEXT OK SET |


- 1 Rotate the rear command dial to choose a corner. The select-
- ed corner is indicated by a triangle.


- 2 Use the focus stick (focus lever) to adjust shading until there is
- no visible difference in color between the selected corner and
- the center of the image.


- ● Press the focus stick left or right to adjust colors on the
- cyan-red axis.
- ● Press the focus stick up or down to adjust colors on the
- blue-yellow axis.


To determine the amount required, adjust color shading correction
while taking photos of blue sky or a sheet of gray paper.
